conditions to enjoy the
highest salary of 120 million VND a month
for heads of public science and technology organizations.
Established in this area, this can be
considered a breakthrough in the salary mechanism
for the team of
scientists as they always face many difficulties
between pursuing their passion and dedicating themselves to
research and maintaining a stable
life.  With 26 years of scientific research, Associate
Professor Dr. Nguyen Truong Thang was
trained in Australia and Japan
as Director of the Institute of
Information Technology, Vietnam Academy of Science and Technology.
His salary is currently only
about 10 million VND compared to the
average level, which is really
low for scientists. We do not have
outside allowances. We feel that we are quite
disadvantaged. Low income is not enough to cover
living expenses, which makes many scientists  Having to
give up pursuing our passion or having to do
many things at the same time and not being able to focus
on research, the salary we
receive from the state cannot guarantee
a living. That's why many
researchers have had to  do a lot of
work, participate in teaching and training, and do part-time jobs
for outside companies. This
also greatly affects their
main jobs in private sector agencies,
their income is very high, and they can retain their
skills.  If you can't keep the downloaders, you
must be of X quality. Many
scientists believe that proposing changes
in the salary and remuneration mechanism for
scientists is very necessary to help them feel secure in
devoting themselves to research
today.  December 11, The People's Committee of

to grow

This causes difficulties for

dry farming profession is closely linked
to life.  The Ca Mau resident community has
long been associated with the history of exploring
the land of Ca Mau. Last night, the Ministry of Culture,
Sports and Tourism announced that
Ca Mau's dry corrugated iron making profession was recognized as an intangible cultural heritage.  There
are currently two types of dried shrimp making industry in Ca Mau,
one is a
traditional form of small production due to the
nature of family crafts or a
modern form of large-scale production based on a
combined technological line.  It
is a
traditional dish during Tet holidays of
Southern people in general and Ca Mau people
in particular, especially Kieu dried shrimp and melon dish which
is an indispensable delicacy during
Tet.  The reason is that Ca Mau dried shrimp is
not only popular locally but
also spread to many localities in the
country and to foreign markets.

Hanoi People's Court will hear the Viet A case
on October 3, 2024
Police investigate the cause of the
discovery of a 15-year-old girl  died in a hanging position,
ladies and gentlemen, the Hanoi People's Court
has just decided to bring to trial the
case that occurred at
Viet A Technology Joint Stock Company, suggesting Viet A Company and a
number of affiliated units.  The trial will open
on October 3, 2024 and is expected to
last for 20
days. In the upcoming trial, 38 defendants will appear,
including Quoc Viet, chairman of the board of
directors K general director of Viet A company
was prosecuted for bribery and violating
bidding regulations causing serious consequences.
Former Minister of Health Nguyen Thanh Long was
prosecuted for accepting bribes. Former Minister of
Science and Technology Chu Ngoc was
indicted.  Violating regulations on management and
use of state assets, causing loss
and waste, Mr. Pham Xuan Thang, former
Secretary of the Hai Duong Provincial Party Committee, was tried for
abusing his position and power while
performing official duties. The remaining 26 people  accused of
violating regulations on bidding, causing
serious consequences, taking advantage of
positions and powers while performing official duties and
taking advantage of influence over people with positions of
authority to seek personal
profits yesterday afternoon on the city's expressway.
Ho Chi Minh City Trung Luong, passing through

request to upgrade the tires, change the exhaust and rims to

rafa border gate to  Such

climate conference. CP to the United Nations devoted
a whole day to discuss
how climate change affects health.
Public health in Bangladesh experts
say climate change is increasing the
risk of hemorrhagic fever
in 2023 Bangladesh has
recorded a record hemorrhagic outbreak
that has infected more than 250,000 people
and more  1000
patients According to the World Health Organization,
infectious diseases such as dengue fever
and jaundice caused by viruses from the nose
are spreading rapidly due to
climate change.
Humidity and rainfall help the green-nosed species to
grow and develop better.
Most of the countries that have recorded
hemorrhagic fever epidemics are in the
tropics and are vulnerable to
climate change at the C climate conference.  28 in
countries like Bangladesh want to see
health as an essential part of the
fight against climate change according to the
World Bank Bangladesh and
other countries in the tropics and
subtropics need to invest in strategies
adaptation to proactively address
climate-induced health impacts
A salt mine in northern Brazil is at
risk of complete collapse after a
portion of the mine collapsed on
December 10.  The incident did not pose a
danger to the surrounding communities because
they had previously been relocated to
another place. On November 29, the city government of
Maio City and the Government of Alaga State issued a
danger warning for the salt mine
named  Mine 18 is owned by
Bras Gam Petrochemical Mining Group. Residents are
advised to stay away from the mining site where there is a risk of
fiber change. Brazilian media broadcast
a video showing
signs of bubbles appearing on the surface of the lake.  Reporting an

unusual phenomenon at the Mine and are closely monitoring the
situation of this salt mine being exploited
to serve the production of

chidera Noo said that she spent a lot of time  The

together lifted the championship trophy after

lead in the

share the championship trophy for the first time
in the history of the tournament. The
weather conditions were not good. We had no
other choice. However, we
were all competing teams.  The best and
completely worthy of winning the championship.
